original_text: And it shall come to pass, that the fishers shall stand upon it from Engedi even unto Eneglaim; they shall be a place to spread forth nets; their fish shall be according to their kinds, as the fish of the great sea, exceeding many.
korean_text: 또 이 강 가에 어부가 설 것이니 엔게디에서부터 에네글라임까지 그물 치는 곳이 될 것이라 그 고기가 각기 종류를 따라 큰 바다의 고기 같이 심히 많으려니와

sentences.original_text: And it shall come to pass
that fishers shall stand upon it
they shall be a place to spread forth nets
their fish shall be according to their kinds
as fish of the great sea
